comments_with_keywords.comment: Module for all arguments to the CLI application. The argument initializes the OptionParser, which defines the arguments in detail. It is also nested with a function that adds all arguments from modules.
comments_with_keywords.name: Arguments

comments_with_keywords.comment: Options is a get method and gets all options from arguments.
comments_with_keywords.name: self.options

comments_with_keywords.comment: It finds out if the plugin is written in the argument.
comments_with_keywords.name: self.active_plugin?
